WMRC 2010 EXHIBITION

Monday, February 15th, 2010

Title: WMRC 2010 EXHIBITION
Location: Brandon Park Community Centre
Start Date: 2010-06-12
End Date: 2010-06-14

Posted in Exhibitions | No Comments »

WMRC 2010 Exhibition

Sunday, January 17th, 2010

The WMRC 2010 Exhibition will be held on the Queen’s Birthday weekend 12th to 14th June 2010 at:

Brandon Park Community Centre
645 Ferntree Gully Road
Glen Waverley.

There will be layouts in 4 different scales, modelling Australian, USA, Japanese, European and UK prototypes.

GUEST LAYOUTS

‘Carlisle River’ VR On30, Stephen Holian
‘Benalta’ Aus HO, Mike Desailly
‘Whytecliffe’ early UK OO, Brian Smith
‘Dorf Druben’ Euro N, Keith Flower
(name t.b.a.) Japanese N, Ian Dingwall
‘Mittelstadt‘ Marklin HO, Lutz Heerde
(t.b.a) Croydon MRC

WMRC LAYOUTS

‘Baldwin & Oswego’ USA N
‘Victoria Bridge’ Vic HO
Becky’s ‘U’ Drive

DEMOS

Lawrie Green & Grant McAdam, ‘The Art of the Diorama’

TRADE & OTHERS

ARHS
Branchline
Train World
Tinkering Tools
Tom’s Hobbies & TrainOrama
Craig Dunstone – Blue & Gold Models
Australian Aviation & Railway Photography
WMRC Sell Stand

Also a club information stand and a canteen!

We look forward to seeing you there.

Georgetown photos

Wednesday, September 10th, 2008

Malcolm Gibson has kindly donated some photos of Georgetown from our 2008 exhibition. You can find them in our Gallery.

Thanks, Malcolm!

Victoria Bridge recieves award at AMRA 2008

Monday, September 1st, 2008

Our Victorian Railways HO scale layout “Victoria Bridge” has been named Best Club Layout at the AMRA 2008 exhibition
